task.summary: Player can drop a distraction item
First implementation of controller overlay, using sprites for the lines
First implementation of controller overlay, using sprites for the lines
Full implementation of the controls overlay
Avoid issues with non patrolling AI's going to sleep in NONE mode
Allow variable tick rates for AI depending on mode
Added UI and simple game state
Added switch and device to the UI
Added middleground and fixed some bugs
AI's now pause when they are saying something
Change graphics for controller Fix the player movement to be on key down
Allow switching between two active players to control
Allow two players to be caught
Animate the transition from one player to another
Changed pressure mats to close controllers now
Don't allow AI's to search the same location
Added start screen and restyled other main screens
Created first part of cut scene
Improved cutscene text and added sound
AI's now open doors as they get to them
Improved the text for the AI transitions
